# list_meal_categories { #py_mealdb.MealDB.list_meal_categories }

```python
MealDB.list_meal_categories()
```

Retrieves detailed information about all meal categories.

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type         | Description                                                                                         |
|--------|--------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|        | CategoryList | CategoryList object containing detailed category information including descriptions and thumbnails. |
